document.full_text: u.s. crude futures extended gains to more than $3 on wednesday, edging above $100 a barrel after a weekly government report showed crude stocks fell slightly in the united states last week as refinery utilization rose.
document.title: u.s. crude up more than $3
lines_and_colors: u.s. crude futures extended gains to more than $3 on wednesday, edging above $100 a barrel after a weekly government report showed crude stocks fell slightly in the united states last week as refinery utilization rose.
